Source Question: Reasons for opt-out request. (Select all that apply)
Question Text: Privacy: I am worried about data being given to my employer/potential employer
Variable Label: Privacy: Worried about data being given to employer/potential employer
Notes: For use by those recording opt-out requests via phone (e.g. NORC helpdesk).  If a form option is ever created for participants to fill out the list will be reduced.
